author: ropeadope62
name: StoryCraft
description: StoryCraft will record dnd session notes as user messages and with GPT-4, write them into a story in the style of high fantasy..
install_msg:
Thank you for installing my repo. 
For issues, bugs, or suggestions contact me in the discord support server here: https://discord.gg/TvzEqSEk
short: Games, utilities or just plain fun discord cogs.
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not persistently store end user data. This cog does store discord IDs as needed for operation. This cog does store user stats for the cog such as their score. Users may remove their own content without making a data removal request. This cog does not support data requests, but will respect deletion requests.
